/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. Buildings and trees line the sides of the road, adding depth and context to the image. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and movement of the city.
